016package io.micronaut.maven.services;
017
018import com.github.dockerjava.api.DockerClient;
019import com.github.dockerjava.api.command.BuildImageCmd;
020import com.github.dockerjava.api.command.BuildImageResultCallback;
021import com.github.dockerjava.api.command.CreateContainerCmd;
022import com.github.dockerjava.api.command.CreateContainerResponse;
023import com.github.dockerjava.api.command.PushImageCmd;
024import com.github.dockerjava.api.command.StartContainerCmd;
025import com.github.dockerjava.api.command.WaitContainerCmd;
026import com.github.dockerjava.api.command.WaitContainerResultCallback;
027import com.github.dockerjava.api.exception.DockerClientException;
028import com.github.dockerjava.api.exception.DockerException;
029import com.github.dockerjava.api.model.AuthConfig;
030import com.github.dockerjava.api.model.AuthConfigurations;
031import com.github.dockerjava.api.model.AuthResponse;
032import com.github.dockerjava.api.model.Bind;
033import com.github.dockerjava.api.model.BuildResponseItem;
034import com.github.dockerjava.api.model.HostConfig;
035import com.github.dockerjava.core.DefaultDockerClientConfig;
036import com.github.dockerjava.core.DockerClientConfig;
037import com.github.dockerjava.core.DockerClientImpl;
038import com.github.dockerjava.transport.DockerHttpClient;
039import com.github.dockerjava.zerodep.ZerodepDockerHttpClient;
040import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.api.Credential;
041import io.micronaut.maven.DockerfileMojo;
042import io.micronaut.maven.jib.JibConfigurationService;
043import org.apache.commons.compress.archivers.tar.TarArchiveEntry;
044import org.apache.commons.compress.archivers.tar.TarArchiveInputStream;
045import org.apache.commons.compress.utils.IOUtils;
046import org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils;
047import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
048import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
049import org.slf4j.Logger;
050import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
051import org.testcontainers.containers.output.FrameConsumerResultCallback;
052import org.testcontainers.containers.output.OutputFrame;
053import org.testcontainers.containers.output.Slf4jLogConsumer;
054import org.testcontainers.utility.DockerImageName;
055import org.testcontainers.utility.RegistryAuthLocator;
056
057import javax.inject.Inject;
058import javax.inject.Singleton;
059import java.io.File;
060import java.io.IOException;
061import java.io.InputStream;
062import java.nio.file.Files;
063import java.util.Optional;
064import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
065
066/**
067 * Provides methods to work with Docker images.
068 *
069 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
070 * @since 1.1
071 */
072@Singleton
073public class DockerService {
074
075    private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(DockerService.class);
076
077    private final DockerClient dockerClient;
078    private final DockerClientConfig config;
079    private final MavenProject mavenProject;
080    private final JibConfigurationService jibConfigurationService;
081
082    @SuppressWarnings("CdiInjectionPointsInspection")
083    @Inject
084    public DockerService(MavenProject mavenProject, JibConfigurationService jibConfigurationService) {
085        this.mavenProject = mavenProject;
086        this.jibConfigurationService = jibConfigurationService;
087        this.config = DefaultDockerClientConfig.createDefaultConfigBuilder().build();
088        DockerHttpClient httpClient = new ZerodepDockerHttpClient.Builder()
089                .dockerHost(config.getDockerHost())
090                .sslConfig(config.getSSLConfig())
091                .build();
092        dockerClient = DockerClientImpl.getInstance(config, httpClient);
093    }
094
095    /**
096     * @param dockerfileName the name of the Dockerfile to load
097     * @return the {@link BuildImageCmd} by loading the given Dockerfile as classpath resource.
098     */
099    public BuildImageCmd buildImageCmd(String dockerfileName) throws IOException {
100        verifyDockerRunning();
101        BuildImageCmd buildImageCmd = dockerClient.buildImageCmd(loadDockerfileAsResource(dockerfileName));
102        maybeConfigureBuildAuth(buildImageCmd);
103        return buildImageCmd;
104    }
105
106    private void maybeConfigureBuildAuth(BuildImageCmd buildImageCmd) {
107        Optional<String> fromImage = jibConfigurationService.getFromImage();
108        Optional<Credential> fromCredentials = jibConfigurationService.getFromCredentials();
109        if (fromImage.isPresent() && fromCredentials.isPresent()) {
110            AuthConfig authConfig = getAuthConfigFor(fromImage.get(), fromCredentials.get().getUsername(), fromCredentials.get().getPassword());
111            AuthConfigurations authConfigurations = new AuthConfigurations();
112            authConfigurations.addConfig(authConfig);
113            buildImageCmd.withBuildAuthConfigs(authConfigurations);
114        }
115    }
116
117    /**
118     * @return a default {@link BuildImageCmd}.
119     */
120    public BuildImageCmd buildImageCmd() {
121        verifyDockerRunning();
122        BuildImageCmd buildImageCmd = dockerClient.buildImageCmd();
123        maybeConfigureBuildAuth(buildImageCmd);
124        return buildImageCmd;
125    }
126
127    /**
128     * Builds the Docker image from the given {@link BuildImageCmd} builder.
129     *
130     * @param builder The builder to use.
131     * @return The resulting image ID.
132     */
133    public String buildImage(BuildImageCmd builder) {
134        verifyDockerRunning();
135        BuildImageResultCallback resultCallback = new BuildImageResultCallback() {
136            @Override
137            public void onNext(BuildResponseItem item) {
138                super.onNext(item);
139                if (item.isErrorIndicated() && item.getErrorDetail() != null) {
140                    LOG.error(item.getErrorDetail().getMessage());
141                } else if (item.getStream() != null) {
142                    String msg = StringUtils.removeEnd(item.getStream(), System.lineSeparator());
143                    LOG.info(msg);
144                }
145            }
146        };
147
148        return builder
149                .exec(resultCallback)
150                .awaitImageId();
151    }
152
153    /**
154     * Creates a container based on a given image, and runs it.
155     *
156     * @param imageId the image to use
157     * @param timeoutSeconds the timeout in seconds for the container to finish execution
158     * @param checkpointNetworkName the name of the network to use for the container
159     * @param binds the bind mounts to use
160     */
161    public void runPrivilegedImageAndWait(String imageId, Integer timeoutSeconds, String checkpointNetworkName, String... binds) throws IOException {
162        verifyDockerRunning();
163        try (CreateContainerCmd create = dockerClient.createContainerCmd(imageId)) {
164            HostConfig hostConfig = create.getHostConfig();
165            if (hostConfig == null) {
166                throw new DockerClientException("When setting binds and privileged, hostConfig was null.  Please check your docker installation and try again");
167            }
168            hostConfig.withPrivileged(true);
169            if (checkpointNetworkName != null) {
170                hostConfig.withNetworkMode(checkpointNetworkName);
171            }
172            for (String bind : binds) {
173                hostConfig.withBinds(Bind.parse(bind));
174            }
175            CreateContainerResponse createResponse = create.exec();
176            try (StartContainerCmd start = dockerClient.startContainerCmd(createResponse.getId())) {
177                start.exec();
178                LOG.info("Container started: {} {}", createResponse.getId(), start.getContainerId());
179                try (WaitContainerCmd wait = dockerClient.waitContainerCmd(createResponse.getId())) {
180                    WaitContainerResultCallback waitResult = wait.start();
181                    LOG.info("Waiting {} seconds for completion", timeoutSeconds);
182                    Integer exitcode = waitResult.awaitStatusCode(timeoutSeconds, TimeUnit.SECONDS);
183                    if (exitcode != 0) {
184                        final Slf4jLogConsumer stdoutConsumer = new Slf4jLogConsumer(LOG);
185                        final Slf4jLogConsumer stderrConsumer = new Slf4jLogConsumer(LOG);
186
187                        try (FrameConsumerResultCallback callback = new FrameConsumerResultCallback()) {
188                            callback.addConsumer(OutputFrame.OutputType.STDOUT, stdoutConsumer);
189                            callback.addConsumer(OutputFrame.OutputType.STDERR, stderrConsumer);
190
191                            dockerClient.logContainerCmd(start.getContainerId())
192                                    .withStdOut(true)
193                                    .withStdErr(true)
194                                    .exec(callback)
195                                    .awaitCompletion();
196                        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
197                            Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
198                        }
199                        throw new IOException("Image " + imageId + " exited with code " + exitcode);
200                    }
201                }
202            }
203        }
204    }
205
206    /**
207     * Copies a file from the specified container path in the given image ID, into a temporal location.
208     *
209     * @param imageId The image ID.
210     * @param containerPath The container path.
211     * @return The temporal file.
212     */
213    public File copyFromContainer(String imageId, String containerPath) {
214        CreateContainerCmd containerCmd = dockerClient.createContainerCmd(imageId);
215        CreateContainerResponse container = containerCmd.exec();
216        dockerClient.startContainerCmd(container.getId());
217        InputStream nativeImage = dockerClient.copyArchiveFromContainerCmd(container.getId(), containerPath).exec();
218
219        try (TarArchiveInputStream fin = new TarArchiveInputStream(nativeImage)) {
220            TarArchiveEntry tarEntry = fin.getNextTarEntry();
221            File file = new File(mavenProject.getBuild().getDirectory(), tarEntry.getName());
222            if (!file.getCanonicalFile().toPath().startsWith(mavenProject.getBuild().getDirectory())) {
223                throw new IOException("Entry is outside of the target directory");
224            }
225
226            IOUtils.copy(fin, Files.newOutputStream(file.toPath()));
227
228            return file;
229        } catch (IOException e) {
230            LOG.error("Failed to copy file from container", e);
231        } finally {
232            containerCmd.close();
233        }
234        return null;
235    }
236
237    /**
238     * Loads the given Dockerfile as classpath resource and copies it into a temporary location in the target directory.
239     *
240     * @param name the name of the Dockerfile.
241     * @return the file where the Dockerfile was copied to.
242     */
243    public File loadDockerfileAsResource(String name) throws IOException {
244        return loadDockerfileAsResource(name, DockerfileMojo.DOCKERFILE);
245    }
246
247    /**
248     * Loads the given Dockerfile as classpath resource and copies it into a temporary location in the target directory.
249     *
250     * @param name the name of the Dockerfile.
251     * @param targetFileName the name of the file to copy the Dockerfile to.
252     * @return the file where the Dockerfile was copied to.
253     */
254    public File loadDockerfileAsResource(String name, String targetFileName) throws IOException {
255        String path = "/dockerfiles/" + name;
256        InputStream stream = getClass().getResourceAsStream(path);
257        if (stream != null) {
258            File dockerfile = new File(mavenProject.getBuild().getDirectory(), targetFileName);
259            FileUtils.copyInputStreamToFile(stream, dockerfile);
260            return dockerfile;
261        }
262        return null;
263    }
264
265    /**
266     * @param imageName the image name
267     * @return a {@link PushImageCmd} from the given image name.
268     */
269    public PushImageCmd pushImageCmd(String imageName) {
270        verifyDockerRunning();
271        return dockerClient.pushImageCmd(imageName);
272    }
273
274    /**
275     *
276     * @param dockerImage the image name
277     * @param username the username
278     * @param password the password
279     * @return an {@link AuthConfig} object for the given image, username and password.
280     */
281    public AuthConfig getAuthConfigFor(String dockerImage, String username, String password) {
282        DockerImageName dockerImageName = DockerImageName.parse(dockerImage);
283        AuthConfig defaultAuthConfig = new AuthConfig()
284                .withRegistryAddress(dockerImageName.getRegistry())
285                .withUsername(username)
286                .withPassword(password);
287        RegistryAuthLocator registryAuthLocator = RegistryAuthLocator.instance();
288        AuthConfig authConfig = registryAuthLocator.lookupAuthConfig(dockerImageName, defaultAuthConfig);
289        AuthResponse authResponse = dockerClient.authCmd().withAuthConfig(authConfig).exec();
290        if (authResponse.getStatus() != null && authResponse.getStatus().equals("Login Succeeded")) {
291            LOG.info("Successfully logged in to registry {}", dockerImageName.getRegistry());
292        } else {
293            LOG.warn("Failed to login to registry {}", dockerImageName.getRegistry());
294        }
295        return authConfig;
296    }
297
298    private void verifyDockerRunning() {
299        try {
300            dockerClient.pingCmd().exec();
301        } catch (DockerException e) {
302            throw new IllegalStateException(e.getMessage());
303        } catch (RuntimeException e) {
304            throw new IllegalStateException("Cannot connect to the Docker daemon at " + config.getDockerHost() + ". Is the docker daemon running?", e);
305        }
306    }
307}
